item.title: Boz - BBB
item.description: It"s the Taint of the Weeku2122 again, so it"s time for Boz to babble complete bollocks in between your requests. All aboard the Train-Wreck, WOO WOOH!

item.title: Gurt - Radio Awesome
item.description: It"s back! The usual show is happening. I can"t think of a spiel right now as I"ve not slept or ate in 24 hours. Rest assured, it will happen, or I"ll eat myself!
